website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and washable, these shoes live up to their name. And insole graphic even helps kids get them on the right feet!
pros: Machine washable synthetic leather and mesh upper
Comes in pink (Zappos), blue and purple (Zappos and Amazon)
cons: Narrower feet might not be able to wear this style

customer_reviews.title: These are great for us
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit my 5 year old perfect and she loves them. Her Dr. recommended either orthadic shoes or Stride Rite shoes to support feet and these are getting the job done. We are so grateful for this recommendation. The soles are stiff and comfy and support her feet very well. She loves them so much she never takes them off.
customer_reviews.author: A Grimey Review

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected and have held up very well with rough, daily daycare play. I would like it more if you could cinch them down tighter so they're not as easy to take off but that's not really a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: A. NicholsTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes - but I’m super frustrated. After having them for less than a week, the stitching on the medial outer part of the shoe is coming apart on one side. For kids’ shoes that cost $45 i expect MUCH better.
customer_reviews.author: Ck

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorated very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Previous pairs of Stride Rite toddler shoes, many purchased from Amazon, held up exceptionally well- lasting six months and more. This pair started deteriorating within two weeks, but I chalked it up to a toddler’s busy feet. Now, less than six weeks from purchase, but outside the return timeframe, these shoes are almost unwearable. The plastic on the Velcro has pulled off. The Velcro itself isn’t sticking. I can not recommend buying these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert John Baron

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: Super great! My daughter has worn them to school every day for sevenonths and they still look awesome! I love this durable brand! I always look for Stride Rite Made2Play. They wash so well in the washing machine, too!
customer_reviews.author: Sara B. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: These are great for our 15month old that is doing a ton ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for our 15month old that is doing a ton of walking. Made the mistake of only sizing up a little bit and she grew out of them much faster than I anticipated. Be sure you get a size that your little one is comfortable in and will last long enough to justify the price.
customer_reviews.author: lpc20

customer_reviews.title: Look at the sizing guide
customer_reviews.text: Great product, pay attention to sizing. My daughter normally wears a one or one and a half and I ordered a 2 1/2 and it fit fine, I just follow the sizing guide.
customer_reviews.author: Schayna L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: WOn't last long at all.
customer_reviews.text: Their qualities has completely changed and I stopped buying them after the last two purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart rapidly
customer_reviews.text: I expect more from Stride Rite. We had my daughters feet professionally measured and the size is correct; actually ordered it a little big. The sides of the shoe are falling apart - very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bayvirgo

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these. The color is great, the shoes are sturdy, and I liked the style. Unfortunately, they fit very narrowly. I purchased a wide for my daughter—her foot is between a medium and a wide—and they are difficult to get on, are uncomfortably tight, and leave marks on the top of her foot. Other than the fit, these are nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Classic brand...
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with Stride Rite. The color is vibrant and beautiful. These sneakers are sturdy too! Which means a lot when you have kids who are rough on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Came apart!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit well, but the top started coming apart after just a couple of months. Stride Rite customer service was great with replacing the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits my daughter's narrow foot, but it feels very stiff compared to other sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Big & not soft
customer_reviews.text: Really big & no padding - rough to wear. We buy stride rite all the time but this was not a favorite - won’t wear them bc aren’t comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoes. Washable and durable. My daughter outgrew previous ones that lasted for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Stride Rite and this pair didn't disappoint...my daughter loves her shoes. Very durable and they can take my kid's active day
customer_reviews.author: Denisse Poole

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes for my kids because they look and fit great and last for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I always choose stride rite shoes for my kids because they look and fit great and last for a long time. This one is no different and I like that I can just wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Rania

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looks nice, but I had put it on my 2 year old few times since I bought it 4 months ago. It’s a struggle to put in on
customer_reviews.author: Mizu13

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old . She has no problems putting them on and can go all day in them.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Chica

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little stiffer than the stride rite light up shoes, but she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Turner

customer_reviews.title: ... dark turquoise than navy but they are still very pretty my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are more of a dark turquoise than navy but they are still very pretty my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Our second pair! Looks cute with most outfits! Fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Ford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute sneaker, fit my 2 year old (almost 3) well.
customer_reviews.author: Alli S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! But, they did get holes where the dark purple plastic meets the light purple mesh. Didn’t last as long as other Stride Rites have in the past. Still great play shoes, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hurts to put them on.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are incredibly difficult to put on. I ordered a second pair in a larger size and still had the same issue. We have other shoes from the same brand so it must be this particular shoe design.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L

customer_reviews.title: What was delivered didn’t match the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I kept them because we love Stride Rite! Would have loved for them to be the color that was pictured!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: great kids shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes , great grip pattern for kids dos'nt get slippery
customer_reviews.author: jason harvey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a big kid shoe. This is infant sized. Cute, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Made2Play Toddler and Little Girls Cannan Atheltic Sneaker
product_meta.description:
Washable hook and loop running shoe

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: When it's play time, it's time for the M2P Cannan sneaker!
Machine washable synthetic leather and mesh upper.

Lightweight construction provides all-day-long comfort. Grip-and-grab heel tab for easy on and off. Grip-and-grab straps with hook-and-loop closure for a secure fit. Cushioned footbed with memory foam for all-day comfort. Insole graphics help kids put their shoes on the correct feet. Dirt-shedding, non-marking outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 4 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9 Toddler, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear
